com.eu.article.bd

Interface ArticleFacade


  • public interface ArticleFacade
    Facade to expose Articles. Created by Juan on 29/09/2016.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ArticleList getAllArticles()
      Obtains all the articles in a the category "Category:Studies"
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getArticleAuthorCount()
      Returns a Map Containing the author as a key and the count of the articles that where published by that Author as values
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getArticleCountryCount()
      Return a Map Containing the Country as a key and the count of the articles of that Country
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getArticleEvidenceBasedPolicyCount()
      Return a Map Containing the EvidenceBasedPolicy as a key and the count of the articles of that EvidenceBasedPolicy
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getArticleFundamentalIssueCount()
      Returns Map Containing the FundamentalIssue as a key and the count of the articles of that FundamentalIssue.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getArticleIndustryCount()
      Returns Map Containing the Industry as a key and the count of the articles of that Industry.
      ArticleList getArticlesByAuthor(java.lang.String author)
      Returns an ArticleList containing all the articles published by the author.
      ArticleList getArticlesByCountry(java.lang.String country)
      Returns an ArticleList containing all the articles published using a dataset from the country.
      ArticleList getArticlesByEvidenceBasedPolicy(java.lang.String evidence)
      Returns an ArticleList containing all the articles published that are using the EvidenceBasedPolicy.

      Gets a List of short Article not including description.

      ArticleList getArticlesInFundamental(java.lang.String fundamental)
      Returns an ArticleList containing all the articles published in an fundamental issue.
      ArticleList getArticlesInIndustry(java.lang.String industry)
      Returns an ArticleList containing all the articles with a dataset published in an industry

      Returns an ArticleList containing all the articles published in a given year

      Returns a Map Containing the year as a key and the count of the articles that where published in that year in as values

      Returns all the similar articles to the provided articles
      ArticleList getSimilarArticles(int pageID, double threshold)
      Returns all the similar articles to the article with the provided id
